messages.message:
Hi Team, When creating a new field in one of the builder app. The `create field` button doesn't highlight until the `advanced mode` is enabled. Is this expected ?
screen recording. - https://www.loom.com/share/c4a0e835335946369c13a32e90fb6183

The create field is activated once user gets back the answer from the prompt. We expect user to modify / refine the prompt until they are satisfied with the values they see in the output. Creation of field should happen post that.

Is that different from your expectations, @subbu? Why?

That makes sense, but what confused me is,  it never returned any results unless I switch on the Advanced mode toggle although the prompts are same. The advanced mode toggle appears to be a optional one but we are forced to enable it in this case. (Not sure if this is the case only with the docs I am working)

I believe you never pressed the enter button / click on the send prompt icon in basic mode. Can you confirm that is the case?

Once you send the prompt, the output value comes back from the LLM and create field button is activated. The behavior is the same across basic / advanced mode.

Oh you are right, my bad I haven't noticed that. I think the difference is by enabling the advanced mode the prompt is sent automatically as soon as the toggle is switched on.
Thank you!
